name: Do not use Cartesian products in Universe properties
description: Do not use Cartesian products in universe properties.
output: List all universes not having the option Cartesian product to "prevent".
rationale: Universes should not allow Cartesian products since they are a symptom of incomplete joins and will affect performance and accuracy
remediation: Set Cartesian products to Prevent (File > Parameters > SQL in Designer)
alternativeName: Do not use Cartesian products in Universe properties

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
